question: Which expressway is also known as National Expressway 1?
explanation: The Ahmedabad - Vadadora Expressway, in Gujarat, is also known as National Expressway and Mahatma Gandhi Expressway. The total length of this expressway is Â 93.1 km. In 1986, it was declared as National Expressway 1. Nadiad and Anand are the two important cities covered in the Ahmedabad - Vadadora Expressway.
